<Isabella_eth_facet> https://ethresear.ch/t/native-rollups-superpowers-from-l1-execution/21517

This is a slam dunk idea by @drakefjustin to extend Zk proof verification from L1 to rollups using native verification. 

This extends L1 security to any rollup without having to depend on random multisigs.
